subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Pat Dobson, who died last Wednesday, was one of four Orioles’ pitchers in 1971 who started 142 of the team’s 158 regular-season games and completed 70 of those starts.
snippet: Pat Dobson, who died last Wednesday, was one of four Orioles’ pitchers in 1971 who started 142 of the team’s 158 regular-season games and completed 70 of those starts.
